quote: Every journey has its final day. Don’t rush!
I never embark on a journey without a good book to accompany me.
When you don’t know what to do, just take the first step. The rest will figure itself out naturally.
If you can change something, change it. If you can’t, don’t waste time thinking about it.
Oh, don’t be nervous. My experiments may be dangerous, but no one gets hurt… most of the time.
Reality is the stillness buried deep beneath the illusion.
Fine. You can touch my ears for a second, but the tail is off limits!
You should know that all power comes at a price. For every bit of power you gain, so too do you gain more responsibility.
I can’t believe that some people actually drink grape juice… if they had a little more patience, they would find that it ferments into the most exquisite wine.
If you can change something, change it. If you can’t, don’t waste time thinking about it.
The world would lose much of its appeal if wholly stripped of delusion and falsehood.
I am Qiqi. I am a zombie. And I forgot what comes next.
Only once you know and respect death can you truly understand the value of life.
Foolish question. There are only two kinds of things – those that must be done and those that must not.

My greatest wish? It has always been to roam free and experience the whole world. Now I would add that wherever I go, it simply must be with you! Each day with you is an adventure, and where adventurers go, storytellers must follow!
If you make a promise, you keep it. If you make a mistake, you apologize. And if you give someone a dream, you defend it to the end.
There’s no style in resorting to violence. It’s simply the worst of all the bad decisions you could make.
I’ve got to find something fun to do… sitting around doing nothing is a fate worse than death.
Yesterday’s experiences make me stronger today.
Going out into the world and investigating, turning the ‘unknown’ into the ‘known.’
If you lie on the grass, you can feel the heartbeat of the world.
Respect must be given to the will of every creature. Each fish in the ocean swims in its own direction
As the wind continues to blow, so too shall I continue to fight.
With authority over a thousand comes a responsibility to a thousand.
I’ll remind you again: The law can be both a help and a hindrance.
A cold beer after a hard day’s work… nothing like it!
Do not seek to emulate the past, for there is no law that can suffice for all time.
The world remains constant over the centuries. But human life is like the dew at dawn or a bubble rising through water. Transitory.
It falls to me to place the truth before your eyes, in all its ugliness.
When your heart is set on something, you get closer to your goal with each passing day.
With you by my side, though our mouths stay silent, my heart is at peace.
I’m flying with you in my heart.
A successful day starts in the morning. Let’s give it our all today.
Discipline is everything. Unbridled passion can have disastrous consequences. Trust me, I would know.
In a trade war, the perfect hunter leaves no trace.
It’s hard to remain on dry land for so long. Can never seem to quite get my land legs back.
